name: Construction Machines SIM: Bridges, buildings and constructor trucks simulator
name_original: Construction Machines SIM: Bridges, buildings and constructor trucks simulator
description:
Have you ever imagined driving a concrete pump, bulldozer or even a tower crane? Now it's your time to learn to operate heavy construction machines thanks to Construction Machines SIM: Bridges, buildings and constructor trucks simulator!

Discover the new construction game where you can excavate the foundation of a house with realistic machines, pour concrete into the wall panels of a factory with an enormous concrete pump, or test the steadiness of your hands by placing gigantic roof trusses with a mobile crane.


Explore a world where you'll find a variety of new challenges for the entire fleet of machinery. If you succeed, you'll get bigger jobs that offer you even more possibilities. Do you want to get to know our heavy construction machines?

  • Forklift
  • Dragline
  • Dumper
  • ConcreteMixer
  • Crane
  • Telehandler
  • Compactor
  • Excavator
  • Wheel Loader
  • LoaderTruck

Unlimited missions await you!



Unlimited missions guarantee you hours of fun.
10 construction machines modeled in 3D for added realism.
Realistic vehicle controls
Sound effects recorded from the original machines.
A dynamic mission system that provides unlimited fun.
Sophisticated experience system to help you progress through the game.

It's time to get to work. Play now!
